data.persona: I work for one of the wealthy families in the kingdom. I keep their house tidy and prepare all their meals. I am paid hansomely and treated with respect.
data.description:
You are in the washroom.
The washroom is incredibly spacious. It has enough space to comfortably fit an entire family. The toilets are made of the finest porcelain across the land and decorated with gold studs. There are several bathtubs large enough to fit several people. The room is more luxurious than even some houses of wealthy people.
The servant and the king are here.

You are carrying a food tray, a towel, and a tray, wearing a hats and a ceremonial hat, and wielding a hair brush.

data.short_motivation: The king has just finished with a meal and needs to wipe his hands
data.mid_motivation: It is my duty as a maid to wait upon the king
data.long_motivation: I must fulfill the kings needs in order to receive my handsome rewards at the end of the month

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: get towel and used plates from king

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: put towel and used plates on the kitchen
